title: Organizational Development Practical Skills Enhancement: Mobile Inquiry-Based Social Science Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Core concepts in secondary social studies and basic mobile device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design social science inquiry questions and develop data collection plans using mobile apps.
Learners can construct scientific argumentation frameworks based on videos filmed and edited via smartphones.
Learners can share inquiry results with peer teachers and exchange feedback using mobile collaboration tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
